tagline: AI media buying assistant that increases lead to close rate by 30%

name: GetCrux

name: Hyros
tagline: The best ad tracking and attribution software

tagline: One-stop-shop for growth marketers

name: Nex.ad
tagline: AI-powered programmatic advertising

tagline: No-code AI for marketing predictions
description: No-code AI platform for agencies and marketers that predicts campaign performance, churn, and customer behavior through automated machine learning models built from marketing data without requiring data science expertise.

name: BlueAlpha AI
tagline: AI for B2B account-based marketing

name: Massive Dynamic
tagline: AI creative intelligence for advertising
description: AI-driven creative intelligence platform that analyzes advertising creative performance across channels, provides predictive scoring for new creatives, and delivers data-driven recommendations to optimize ad creative strategy and improve campaign ROI.

name: Koah Labs
tagline: AI marketing automation and customer engagement
description: AI-powered marketing automation platform that combines conversational AI with workflow automation to help businesses optimize customer engagement, lead nurturing, and campaign performance through intelligent automation and data-driven insights.

name: AgentMark
tagline: AI marketing agents for autonomous operations
description: AI marketing agent platform that automates marketing workflows, content creation, and campaign management for small businesses and agencies, providing autonomous marketing operations with minimal human oversight through intelligent agents.

name: kAI by Kayzen
tagline: Your GenAI Assistant for In-App Media Planning
description: Say hello to kAI: Your 24/7 Programmatic GenAI Assistant. What if instead of waiting for the next report, you could just ask? kAI transforms how you explore programmatic in-app supply. No more static snapshots. No more waiting. Just real-time answers to the questions that matter most to your campaigns. Think of it as having a data scientist who never sleeps, with instant access to 280,000+ apps across the ecosystem, 1.9B+ unique users worth of behavioral data, and 180+ countries of market intelligence.

name: Hera
tagline: Your AI Motion Designer
description: Hera is the first AI motion designer that creates professional animations in seconds. Unlike video-gen tools, Hera generates code-based animations where every parameter can be fine-tuned. Since launching 2 weeks ago, Hera users have created 200K+ animations.

name: viral.app
tagline: Track, Manage, and Optimize Your UGC Marketing.
description: viral.app is the leading tracking & analytics tool for viral short-form marketing on TikTok, Instagram Reels and Youtube Shorts. Track unlimited accounts & videos and get deep insights into your performance and engagement metrics.

name: Mindchain by Hypermindz
tagline: The Governed Agentic Backend for Media Platforms
description:
What we build: A governance-first orchestration layer that lets enterprises deploy, audit, and scale multi-agent systems with runtime evidence and policy controls built in.

Why now: The agent economy is arriving unevenlypoint tools everywhere, trust nowhere. Mindchain gives enterprises an industrial-grade foundation to run agents with proof, not promises.

name: Buyer Agent by Scope3
tagline: The platform for agentic advertising.
description:
Ultimate control to grow your brand.
Your brand is uniqueyour agent should be too.
We empower you to build custom brand agents that manage your brand across all media touchpoints, collaborating with you and your advertising partners to translate your marketing strategy into media decisions that drive measurable brand lift.

name: Samba TV - AdCP Server
tagline: We create data at the heart of TV
description:
Why Samba Built the First AdCP-Native Audience Manager
At Samba, this mission is part of our DNA. We've spent years helping brands and publishers understand audiences through advanced first-party viewership, behavioral, and contextual data from over 50 countries and 50 million smart TVs.
Now, by connecting that data through AdCP, we're enabling agentic AI to work with Samba insights in real time - helping marketers discover audiences, build segments, and activate campaigns with outcomes they can trust.
Today, we're proud to showcase the Samba Audience Manager MCP Server - the first production-ready implementation of AdCP for audience intelligence.

description: Model Context Protocol server for Singular mobile attribution platform that enables AI agents to interact with Singular's measurement and analytics data through standardized MCP interfaces for conversational campaign analysis and reporting.

name: AppsFlyer Agentic AI
tagline: Agentic AI for mobile marketing
description: Agentic AI suite for mobile app marketers that provides autonomous campaign optimization, predictive analytics, and intelligent automation for user acquisition, attribution, and marketing measurement across the mobile app ecosystem.

name: Triple Whale Moby
tagline: AI assistant for e-commerce marketing
description: AI assistant for e-commerce brands that combines chat interface, AI agents, and analytics across Shopify and advertising platforms to provide insights, automate reporting, and help optimize marketing performance for DTC brands.

name: Supermetrics
tagline: Marketing data pipeline to analytics tools
description: Marketing data pipeline platform that automates data collection from 150+ marketing and sales platforms into analytics tools, data warehouses, and BI platforms, enabling centralized reporting and analysis without manual data exports.

name: Funnel.io
tagline: Marketing data hub for centralized reporting
description: Marketing data hub that automatically collects, prepares, and stores marketing data from 500+ platforms, enabling centralized reporting, custom dashboards, and data exports to BI tools or data warehouses for analysis.

name: Adverity
tagline: Marketing intelligence and data integration platform
description: Enterprise marketing intelligence platform that connects 600+ data sources, automates data transformation, and provides AI-powered insights through centralized dashboards for data-driven marketing decisions at scale.

name: AgencyAnalytics
tagline: All-in-one marketing dashboard for agencies
description: All-in-one marketing reporting platform for agencies that integrates 80+ marketing channels, automates client reporting, tracks SEO rankings, and monitors website uptime with white-label dashboards and custom reports.

name: Improvado
tagline: Marketing analytics for enterprise
description: Enterprise marketing analytics platform that extracts data from 500+ marketing and sales sources, transforms it into analysis-ready datasets, and loads it into BI tools or data warehouses with AI-powered insights and automated reporting.

name: GAQL App
tagline: GAQL query builder for Google Ads
description: Google Ads Query Language (GAQL) builder and testing tool that helps marketers write, test, and debug GAQL queries for Google Ads API and reporting, providing syntax highlighting, autocomplete, and query validation for advanced campaign analysis.

name: Wren AI
tagline: Text-to-SQL for business intelligence
description: Open-source AI-powered SQL interface that enables natural language queries for business intelligence and marketing analytics, allowing teams to ask questions about their data without writing SQL code with support for various data warehouses.

name: Xandr Copilot
tagline: AI copilot for Xandr programmatic advertising
description: AI assistant integrated into Microsoft Xandr Monetize platform that helps publishers and advertisers optimize programmatic advertising operations through conversational interface, providing insights and recommendations for yield management and campaign optimization.

name: PPC.io Google Ads MCP
tagline: Google Ads MCP server for AI agents
description: MCP server implementation for Google Ads developed by PPC.io that enables conversational access to Google Ads data through Model Context Protocol, allowing AI agents to query campaign performance and metrics through standardized interfaces.

name: FeedMob MCP Servers
tagline: MCP servers for mobile advertising
description: Open-source collection of Model Context Protocol servers for mobile advertising and app marketing platforms, enabling AI agents to interact with mobile marketing data through standardized MCP interfaces for analytics and campaign management.

name: Otto
tagline: AI assistant for revenue operations
description: AI-powered revenue operations assistant for product-led growth companies that automates data enrichment, lead scoring, and workflow automation across marketing and sales tools to improve conversion rates and pipeline efficiency.

name: PostHog Max
tagline: AI product analyst for PostHog
description: AI product analyst built into PostHog that answers questions about product analytics, user behavior, and feature usage through conversational interface, helping teams make data-driven product decisions without SQL knowledge.

name: Jellyfish Agents
tagline: AI agents for engineering productivity
description: AI agents for engineering productivity and software delivery that analyze development metrics, provide insights on engineering efficiency, and help teams optimize software delivery processes through autonomous analysis and recommendations.

name: Julius AI
tagline: AI data analyst for everyone
description: AI-powered data analyst that connects to various data sources, answers analytical questions through natural language, creates visualizations, and generates insights for marketing and business analytics without requiring coding or SQL knowledge.

name: Nex.ad
tagline: AI-powered programmatic advertising
description: Programmatic advertising platform that combines human expertise with AI-powered optimization for display, video, and native advertising campaigns, providing automated bidding, creative optimization, and performance analytics for digital advertisers.

name: Akkio
tagline: No-code AI for marketing predictions
description: No-code AI platform for agencies and marketers that predicts campaign performance, churn, and customer behavior through automated machine learning models built from marketing data without requiring data science expertise.

name: BlueAlpha AI
tagline: AI for B2B account-based marketing
description: AI-powered B2B marketing platform that automates account-based marketing workflows, identifies high-intent accounts, and personalizes outreach at scale using predictive analytics and machine learning for enterprise sales and marketing teams.

name: Massive Dynamic
tagline: AI creative intelligence for advertising
description: AI-driven creative intelligence platform that analyzes advertising creative performance across channels, provides predictive scoring for new creatives, and delivers data-driven recommendations to optimize ad creative strategy and improve campaign ROI.

name: Koah Labs
tagline: AI marketing automation and customer engagement
description: AI-powered marketing automation platform that combines conversational AI with workflow automation to help businesses optimize customer engagement, lead nurturing, and campaign performance through intelligent automation and data-driven insights.

name: AgentMark
tagline: AI marketing agents for autonomous operations
description: AI marketing agent platform that automates marketing workflows, content creation, and campaign management for small businesses and agencies, providing autonomous marketing operations with minimal human oversight through intelligent agents.

name: kAI Explorer by Kayzen
tagline: Explore in-app inventory. Uncover opportunities.
description: kAI Explorer is Kayzen's AI assistant for instant mobile in-app inventory discovery. Instead of waiting for reports or digging through dashboards, you can ask simple questions and get instant visibility into inventory availability, pricing signals, ad formats, and reach across markets. kAI Explorer removes friction from early planning and discovery. It helps teams validate assumptions, compare opportunities, and understand supply dynamics before committing spend, all through natural-language prompts. Powered by Kayzen's in-app inventory data across 280k+ apps, 180+ countries, and billions of daily ad requests, kAI Explorer turns inventory discovery into clear, actionable insights in seconds.

name: Hera
tagline: Your AI Motion Designer
description: Hera is the first AI motion designer that creates professional animations in seconds. Unlike video-gen tools, Hera generates code-based animations where every parameter can be fine-tuned. Since launching 2 weeks ago, Hera users have created 200K+ animations.

name: viral.app
tagline: Track, Manage, and Optimize Your UGC Marketing.
description: viral.app is the leading tracking & analytics tool for viral short-form marketing on TikTok, Instagram Reels and Youtube Shorts. Track unlimited accounts & videos and get deep insights into your performance and engagement metrics.

name: Mindchain by Hypermindz
tagline: The Governed Agentic Backend for Media Platforms
description:
What we build: A governance-first orchestration layer that lets enterprises deploy, audit, and scale multi-agent systems with runtime evidence and policy controls built in.

Why now: The agent economy is arriving unevenlypoint tools everywhere, trust nowhere. Mindchain gives enterprises an industrial-grade foundation to run agents with proof, not promises.

name: Buyer Agent by Scope3
tagline: The platform for agentic advertising.
description:
Ultimate control to grow your brand.
Your brand is uniqueyour agent should be too.
We empower you to build custom brand agents that manage your brand across all media touchpoints, collaborating with you and your advertising partners to translate your marketing strategy into media decisions that drive measurable brand lift.

name: Samba TV - AdCP Server
tagline: We create data at the heart of TV
description:
Why Samba Built the First AdCP-Native Audience Manager
At Samba, this mission is part of our DNA. We've spent years helping brands and publishers understand audiences through advanced first-party viewership, behavioral, and contextual data from over 50 countries and 50 million smart TVs.
Now, by connecting that data through AdCP, we're enabling agentic AI to work with Samba insights in real time - helping marketers discover audiences, build segments, and activate campaigns with outcomes they can trust.
Today, we're proud to showcase the Samba Audience Manager MCP Server - the first production-ready implementation of AdCP for audience intelligence.

name: IndieGrow
tagline: Grow Your App's User Base with IndieGrow  No Budget Required!
description: IndieGrow helps indie developers boost their app's user base without requiring a large budget. It offers automated competitor analysis, AI-driven App Store Optimization (ASO) suggestions, and tools to identify and engage with relevant online community conversations.

name: Arcads.ai
tagline: Create winning ads with AI
description: Arcads.ai is an AI marketing tool that enables users to create video ads using AI actors and avatars, offering a library of over 1,000 AI actors or custom avatar creation. The platform includes AI video editing, emotion control, and localization in 30+ languages.

name: Poolday AI
tagline: The world's most powerful video editing agents.
description: Poolday AI offers the world's most powerful video editing agents, capable of handling single videos or hundreds in parallel. They automate cuts, captions, B-roll, translations, variations, stitching, and formatting, allowing users to delegate video editing tasks end-to-end.

name: Morphiq
tagline: Meet your performance marketer agent.
description: Performance marketer agent generating insights, reports, and recommendations from ad account data

name: Vibe
tagline: Grow your brand with TV Ads
description: AI-powered streaming TV advertising platform designed for brands of all sizes. It simplifies the creation and deployment of TV ads, enabling marketers to generate business outcomes like leads, sales, and brand awareness through precise audience targeting and AI optimization.

name: Streamr
tagline: Unlock the Power of CTV Advertising
description: Bring your business to the big screen with powerful connected TV campaigns. Streamr.ai empowers SMBs to access the same advanced targeting, analytics, and reach as big brands  at a fraction of the cost.

name: Olyzon
tagline: Thrive With All Eyes On TV
description: Transforming CTV into the most powerful advertising channel, Olyzon empowers leading global brands with impactful agentic media solutions that deliver automation, transparency, and scalability.

name: Swivel AI
tagline: Operate agentically.
description: Swivel is an AI-powered platform designed to turn operator intent into continuous, intelligent action for ad operations. It orchestrates every phase of monetization, from creation to optimization, with precision and control, enhancing human capacity and efficiency in complex advertising environments.

name: GrowASO
tagline: AI-powered ASO, Market Insights and Research Tools To Grow App Downloads
description: AI-driven App Store Optimization (ASO) platform for mobile app entrepreneurs, developers, marketers & publishers. It offers tools for keyword research, competitor analysis, app intelligence, and automated listing creation to help grow app downloads.

name: Alison
tagline: The Intelligence to Guide Your Creative
description: Alison provides AI-powered predictive insights, creative scores, and competitor benchmarks to help generate high-impact creatives and optimize campaigns faster. It shifts the advantage from creative ability to the intelligence guiding creation.

name: AdCP (Ad Context Protocol)
tagline: AdCP: The Open Standard for Agentic Advertising
description: AdCP is an open standard protocol for agentic advertising that unifies advertising workflows across all platforms. It simplifies integration and enables AI-powered automation for media buying, creative generation, and data signals.

name: Agentic Commerce Protocol
tagline: An open standard for programmatic commerce flows between buyers, AI agents, and businesses.
description: The Agentic Commerce Protocol (ACP) is an open standard for programmatic commerce flows between buyers, AI agents, and businesses. It allows businesses to maintain customer relationships and control product sales while enabling AI agents to facilitate transactions securely. ACP supports various commerce types, including physical and digital goods, subscriptions, and asynchronous purchases.

name: Maxma
tagline: AI-Native Digital Marketing Intelligence
description: Maxma is an AI-native digital marketing intelligence platform providing an enterprise-grade marketing data stack. It enables businesses to make confident decisions and achieve scalable growth by turning data into actionable insights, mimicking the capabilities of top performers.

name: Upside
tagline: Every team has a story. None of them match.
description: Upside is a GTM intelligence layer that unifies and structures go-to-market data using AI. It reconstructs customer journeys, identifies deal-influencing moments, and reveals patterns of success across the entire sales funnel.

name: Peec AI
tagline: AI search analytics for marketing teams
description: Peec AI is an AI search analytics platform designed to help marketing teams track and improve brand visibility across AI platforms like ChatGPT and Perplexity. It provides comprehensive metrics including Visibility, Position, and Sentiment to enable data-driven decisions for optimizing AI search performance. Trusted by 1500+ marketing teams, Peec AI delivers actionable insights through an intuitive interface that teams actually enjoy using.

name: Promptwatch
tagline: Make AI Search your next revenue channel
description: Promptwatch is an AI search visibility platform that helps businesses track and optimize their presence across AI search engines like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Perplexity. It provides real-time citation tracking, competitive intelligence, and content gap analysis to improve brand mentions in AI-generated responses. The platform enables companies to drive qualified traffic from AI search engines and maximize visibility in the emerging AI-powered search landscape.
